duties_responsibilities.duty: Production of parts meeting drawing and specification requirements. Set-up and operation of assigned equipment.
Perform statistical process control measurements and calculations.
Order and maintain inventory levels of required tooling, gages, and supplies.
Assemble tooling set-up kits, stage raw materials and perform external setup tasks.
Prepare daily production reports and forms.
Ensure that all work activities are performed in accordance with established safety and environmental standards.

education_certification.credential: Minimum of 1 year of mechanical experience
